system.descriptor: Become associated and possibly obsessed with a specific machine, gaining an understanding of its deepest intricacies.
system.uses: Treat this advance as a Talent. Select one specific sophisiticated Machine, such as a voidship component, specific starfighter, or archeotech relic. The character can spend a Fate Point to immediately determine the cause of a problem afflicting that machine, and add a bonus to 5xIntelligence Bonus (max +30) to next test to repair or alleviate the problem. Gain +10 to all tests to use machine. If machine is destroyed, even if character not present, gain 2d10 Insanity Points and are immediately aware of its destruction. Can transfer this talent to a new machine if given time to bond with and understand it.
